fields.name: Forum
fields.location_message: You there! Yes, you! Come and join me on campus for a special quest!

fields.name: Northcott
fields.location_message: *BELCH* Oh hello there traveller. Care to *BURP* help me out with something? I'm by the top of the *WURP* hill.

fields.name: Great Hall
fields.location_message: Salutations young one. I require some assistance. You couldn't spare me some precious time could you? I reside on Stocker Road.

fields.name: Peter Chalk
fields.location_message: GREETINGS STUDENT. I AM HERE TO OFFER YOU A TASK. WILL YOU ACCEPT? I AM FORWARDING MY CO-ORDINATES TO YOU NOW.

fields.name: Physics
fields.location_message: A pleasure to hear from you again. Please, we should reconvene at my tower. You really must see the city from the top. It is marvellous.

fields.name: Sports Hall
fields.location_message: Hey buddy! Got some free time? I'm right at the top of campus. Can't miss it. Stocker Road!

fields.name: Sports Park
fields.location_message: Hey the view here is amazing. You should come check it out! Stocker Road, can't miss it!

fields.name: Laver
fields.location_message: Wassah dudeeee. Hey check it we got a real cool thing going on here. N Park Road. Be there or be square bro.

fields.name: Harrison
fields.location_message: How do you do? Would you care to assist me? N Park Road. The one with loads of stairs!

fields.name: Amory
fields.location_message: I am receiving a communication link from a human! I come in peace! Let's talk business on Rennes Drive!

fields.name: Business
fields.location_message: My goodness. It is so good to see you. Let's catch up at the usual spot on Rennes Drive. I have something for you!

fields.name: Lemongrove
fields.location_message: Looking slightly more sober today! Maybe I can help with that hangover? St German's Road. The path is a bit less perilous in daylight!

fields.name: Hatherly
fields.location_message: *ahem* H-h-hello again. C-c-ca-can you help? P-p-puh-prince of wales road.

fields.name: Queens
fields.location_message: Your highness demands your attention. She awaits you at The Queen's Drive.

fields.name: Washington
fields.location_message: Yes I live there. Yes that big building. Yes the one you've never been to!

fields.name: Reed Hall
fields.location_message: You are telling me you haven't seen the hall? You must come at once! On Streatham Drive with all the gardens and the fountains. Please come and explore for yourself!
